name: Karavites v. Pulakos, Inc. et al., Appellants

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
parties: Karavites v. Pulakos, Inc. et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below granting the plaintiff a new trial is affirmed at the appellants’ costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Fred B. Sieber, -with him Dana Sherwood Jones, for appellants.
'Will J. Scha-afj with him John A.Spaeder, and Marsh, Bpaeder, Baur, Spaeder & Schaaf, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Karavites v. Pulakos, Inc. et al., Appellants.
Argued March 18, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
Fred B. Sieber, -with him Dana Sherwood Jones, for appellants.
'Will J. Scha-afj with him John A.Spaeder, and Marsh, Bpaeder, Baur, Spaeder & Schaaf, for appellee.
April 20, 1959:
